actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for congressional review of annual congressional pay adjustments, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Congressional Pay Review Act of 1979 - Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to require, before an annual pay adjustment for Members of Congress takes effect, that a concurrent resolution approving such adjustment be introduced and adopted during any session by both Houses of the Congress. Requires that the vote of each House on the concurrent resolution be recorded so as to reflect the vote of each individual Member.

titles.title: A bill to provide for congressional review of annual congressional pay adjustments, and for other purposes.
